comments.author: sphink@gmail.com
comments.text:
It'd be cool to be able to search for some text within the contents of all of my open tabs. Not the titles, I mean -- the actual text within the pages. The equivalent of manually going to each tab in turn and doing a quicksearch.("I can't remember where I found X, but there's a good chance I still have a tab open to the page.")

(On the other hand, this would give me even more incentive to hoard tabs...)
